languages.text: При {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}отталкивании{/g} цель может столкнуться со стеной, другим персонажем или иным препятствием. Урон при столкновении уменьшается {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражением{/g} и рассчитывается иначе, чем обычно. Обратите внимание: если цель врезается в другого персонажа, урон от столкновения получают оба. При этом персонаж, в которого врезалась цель, не может {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g} от столкновения.

Whenever a target is {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g}, it can collide with walls, another character, or other obstacles. Collision damage is reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and is calculated differently than regular damage. Note that if a target collides with another character, both will suffer collision damage. That character also cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the collision.
languages.original_text: При {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}отталкивании{/g} цель может столкнуться со стеной, другим персонажем или иным препятствием. Урон при столкновении уменьшается {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражением{/g} и рассчитывается иначе, чем обычно. Обратите внимание: если цель врезается в другого персонажа, урон от столкновения получают оба. При этом персонаж, в которого врезалась цель, не может {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g} от столкновения.

traits.locale_text: Whenever a target is pushed, it might collide with a wall, another character, or some other obstacle. Collision damage is reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and is calculated differently than regular damage. Note that if a target collides with another character, both will suffer collision damage. That character also cannot dodge the collision.

Whenever a target is pushed, it might collide with a wall, another character, or some other obstacle. Collision damage is reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and is calculated differently than regular damage. Note that if a target collides with another character, both will suffer collision damage. That character also cannot dodge the collision.

Whenever a target is {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g}, it can collide with walls, another character, or other obstacles. Collision damage is reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and is calculated differently than regular damage. Note that if a target collides with another character, both will suffer collision damage. That character also cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the collision.

Whenever a target is {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g}, it can collide with walls, another character, or other obstacles. Collision damage is reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and is calculated differently than regular damage. Note that if a target collides with another character, both will suffer collision damage. That character also cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the collision.

Whenever a target is {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g}, it can collide with walls, another character, or other obstacles. Collision damage is reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and is calculated differently than regular damage. Note that if a target collides with another character, both will suffer collision damage. That character also cannot {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} the collision.

Whenever a target is {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g}, it can collide with walls, another character, or other obstacles. Collision damage is reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and is calculated differently than regular damage. Note that if a target collides with another character, both will suffer collision damage. That character also cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the collision.

languages.text: Cuando se {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}empuja{/g} a un objetivo, puede chocar con muros, otro personaje u obstáculos. El daño por colisión se reduce por el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} y se calcula de forma distinta que el daño normal. Ten en cuenta que si el objetivo colisiona con otro personaje, ambos sufren daño por colisión. El otro personaje no podrá {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivar{/g} la colisión.
languages.original_text: Whenever a target is {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g}, it can collide with walls, another character, or other obstacles. Collision damage is reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and is calculated differently than regular damage. Note that if a target collides with another character, both will suffer collision damage. That character also cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the collision.

traits.locale_text: Cuando se empuja a un objetivo, puede chocar con muros, otro personaje u obstáculos. El daño por colisión se reduce por el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} y se calcula de forma distinta que el daño normal. Ten en cuenta que si el objetivo colisiona con otro personaje, ambos sufren daño por colisión. El otro personaje no podrá {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquivar{/g} la colisión.

languages.text: ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}押される{/g}たびに、壁や他のキャラクター、その他の障害物に衝突する可能性がある。衝突ダメージは{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}受け流し{/g}によって軽減され、通常のダメージとは計算方法が異なる。注：ターゲットが他のキャラクターと衝突した場合、両方とも衝突ダメージを受ける。またそのキャラクターは衝突を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}することはできない。
languages.original_text: Whenever a target is {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g}, it can collide with walls, another character, or other obstacles. Collision damage is reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and is calculated differently than regular damage. Note that if a target collides with another character, both will suffer collision damage. That character also cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the collision.

traits.locale_text: ターゲットが押されるたびに、壁や他のキャラクター、その他の障害物に衝突する可能性がある。衝突ダメージは{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}受け流し{/g}によって軽減され、通常のダメージとは計算方法が異なる。注：ターゲットが他のキャラクターと衝突した場合、両方とも衝突ダメージを受ける。またそのキャラクターは衝突を{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}することはできない。

languages.text: 当您将目标{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}推开{/g}时，目标可能会与墙壁、其他角色或障碍物发生碰撞。撞击伤害与普通伤害计算方法不同，但同样会受到{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}效果影响。请注意，如果某个角色与其他角色相撞，则撞击双方都会受到碰撞伤害。碰撞伤害无法通过{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}来躲避。
languages.original_text: Whenever a target is {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g}, it can collide with walls, another character, or other obstacles. Collision damage is reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and is calculated differently than regular damage. Note that if a target collides with another character, both will suffer collision damage. That character also cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the collision.

traits.locale_text: 当您将目标推开时，目标可能会与墙壁、其他角色或障碍物发生碰撞。撞击伤害与普通伤害计算方法不同，但同样会受到{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}效果影响。请注意，如果某个角色与其他角色相撞，则撞击双方都会受到碰撞伤害。碰撞伤害无法通过{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}来躲避。
当您将目标推开时，目标可能会与墙壁、其他角色或障碍物发生碰撞。撞击伤害与普通伤害计算方法不同，但同样会受到{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}效果影响。请注意，如果某个角色与其他角色相撞，则撞击双方都会受到碰撞伤害。碰撞伤害无法通过{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}来躲避。

languages.text: Wird ein Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}weggestoßen{/g}, kann es mit Wänden, einem anderen Charakter oder Hindernissen kollidieren. Kollisionsschaden wird durch {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} reduziert und anders berechnet als normaler Schaden. Stößt ein Ziel mit einem anderen Charakter zusammen, erleiden beide Kollisionsschaden. Außerdem kann dieser Charakter dem Zusammenstoß nicht {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweichen{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever a target is {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g}, it can collide with walls, another character, or other obstacles. Collision damage is reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and is calculated differently than regular damage. Note that if a target collides with another character, both will suffer collision damage. That character also cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the collision.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn ein Ziel weggestoßen wird, kann es mit Wänden, einem anderen Charakter oder anderen Hindernissen kollidieren. Kollisionsschaden wird durch {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} reduziert und wird anders berechnet als der normale Schaden. Wenn ein Ziel mit einem anderen Charakter zusammenstößt, erleiden beide Kollisionsschaden. Dieser Charakter kann dem Zusammenstoß auch nicht {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}ausweichen{/g}.

languages.text: Lorsqu'une cible est {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}repoussée{/g}, elle peut percuter des murs, un autre personnage ou d'autres obstacles. Les dégâts de collision sont réduits par la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} et sont calculés différemment des dégâts normaux. Notez que si une cible percute un autre personnage, tous deux subiront des dégâts de collision. Ce personnage ne sera pas non plus en mesure d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g} la collision.
languages.original_text: Whenever a target is {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g}, it can collide with walls, another character, or other obstacles. Collision damage is reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and is calculated differently than regular damage. Note that if a target collides with another character, both will suffer collision damage. That character also cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the collision.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'une cible est poussée, elle peut entrer en collision avec les murs, un autre personnage ou d'autres obstacles. Les dégâts de collision sont réduits par la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} et sont calculés différemment des dégâts normaux. Notez que si une cible entre en collision avec un autre personnage, tous deux subiront des dégâts de collision. Ce personnage ne sera pas non plus en mesure d’{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiver{/g} la collision.

languages.text: Bir hedef {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}itildiğinde{/g} duvarla, başka bir karakterle veya benzeri bir engelle çarpışabilir. Çarpışma hasarı, {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değeri sayesinde azalır ve normal hasardan farklı hesaplanır. Hedef başka bir karakterle çarpışırsa her ikisinin de çarpışma hasarı alacağını unutma. O karakter de çarpışmadan {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınamaz{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever a target is {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g}, it can collide with walls, another character, or other obstacles. Collision damage is reduced by {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} and is calculated differently than regular damage. Note that if a target collides with another character, both will suffer collision damage. That character also cannot {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} the collision.
